medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported dyspnea two hours before arrival at the hospital, where her usual oxygen dosage was increased from 2 L/min to 5 L/min. Despite this increase, her dyspnea did not improve, and her SpO2 decreased to as low as 80%, prompting her to seek emergency care.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of pulmonary tuberculosis, lung cancer (following partial right lobe resection and radiotherapy), bronchiectasis, and elevated methemoglobin levels (10% and 20% at 5 and 2 years prior).
